Articles.Content:
I have this problem with heating and fairings: My payload is fully protected by fairings, but then this happens: http://imgur.com/a/7Tvta

FAR is updated to 15.2 "Ferri" and DRE is fully updated to 0.7.3

Edited May 23, 2015 by crashy
I had the same problem just last night with procedural parts (batteries) hidden inside the service bay but i used procedural fairings. Did you have any suecess with ID-ing the problem?

That's due to DRE, if you look at the thread everithing is explained. It must be related to the heat transmitted from the exterior part (the fairings) the the interiors (batteries, that have low temperature limit), so that's not completely a bug. Probably, you were too fast in low atmosphere.
